item.description:
THIS EVENT IS POSTPONED!


Pardon my ignorance, but apparently this night is the 'Official Halloween Party Night"! We've decided to postpone FiRE & iCE. It is such a fun place and I don't want anyone to miss it. I'll repost as soon as the new date and time is chosen. Meanwhile, hope you have a Happy Halloween, and don't eat too much of the kiddies' candy!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: FiRE & iCE is being postponed to another date!
